div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Sept. 26, 1918. CZECHOSLOVAK ART ENLISTS FOR THE CZECHOSLOVAK MOVEMENT

body.p: The Chicago Evening Post, which prints the Czechoslovak cause of liberation, had in last Tuesday's issue an article headed "Czechoslovak Art". Several items appear on the page devoted to art. They all deal with Czechoslovak artists.....

Leslie's Weekly reproduced a picture by the Czech-American, Sarka. It shows a Czechoslovak warrior with sword in hand and one foot resting upon a German helmet. It symbolizes the "Rebirth of a Nation".....
